posts._title: Louis Malle – My Dinner with Andre (1981) (HD)
posts.title: My Dinner with Andre (1981)
posts.excerpt: Roger Ebert review: The idea is astonishing in its audacity: a film of two friends talking, just simply talking—but with passion, wit, scandal, whimsy, vision, hope, and despair—for 110 minutes. posts.title: Salón México

posts.title: Waking Life
